add-child-unit-button.demo-privacy-policy:
DATA PROTECTION

With this statement, we inform you about aspects relevant to data protection as well as the measures used to protect your rights. Brockhaus AG complies with the requirements of the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG) and the EU General Data Protection Regulation (EU-DSGVO).

1. COLLECTION AND USE OF PERSONAL DATA

1.1 Basic

The sole purpose of your data is to provide you with the most user-friendly, practical and secure Internet service possible. Personal data includes all information about personal or factual circumstances of an identified or identifiable natural person, e.g. name, address, contact details, IP addresses, data volumes transferred, etc.

1.2 Legal basis

a) The provision of this website with products and services: Contract initiation or contract fulfillment
b) Requests by mail, email or fax to us: contract initiation or fulfillment
c) Links to other offers or evaluation of accesses: legitimate interest.

1.3 Automatic processing by website operation

The websites are operated by a provider in Western Europe (Frankfurt, Germany), which in turn stores the accesses to the system in so-called server logs for the operation of the web offer. In doing so, the following data is usually collected: IP addresses, timestamps of accesses, names of web pages, amounts of data transferred, logouts or terminations, browser types, information from the operating system, referrer URLs. This data is not stored or evaluated by us. In the event of a justified suspicion of abuse based on concrete information, these log files can be subsequently checked.

1.4 Data input by the website user

You can furthermore, use our websites without the input of personal data without restriction. If we collect personal data (contact form), we will inform in each case about the purpose, scope, legality, and possible disclosure and use this only for these purposes. The input of this data by you is voluntary.

2. USE OF DATA

2.1 Use for service provision

We use the personal data collected and processed exclusively for the purposes of providing our services under the user agreement concluded with you and for processing payments. In doing so, we naturally comply with all applicable data protection laws, in particular the German Federal Data Protection Act/EU-DSGVO and the German Telemedia Act (TMG).

2.2 Disclosure to third parties

We do not pass on your personal data to third parties for marketing or similar purposes. Data will only be passed on if and insofar as this is necessary for the implementation of the user agreement, Brockhaus AG is legally obliged to do so or it should be necessary to enforce the general terms of use or other agreements concluded with you as well as our rights and claims.

2.3 Customer information by eMail

In the context of customer loyalty, we send current information to our customers to inform you about news and changes within our offer. This information is not to be confused with the general newsletters. If it concerns our offers and contains e.g. safety-relevant points or important information from our house, we can handle this only by eMail. Please have understanding for it.

3. COOKIES

Our website uses cookies to provide you with an effective experience and user-friendly handling. This makes the use of cookies necessary and justifies our legitimate interest in using this technology. Most browsers offer you the functionality to display the cookies used.
However, if you would like to generally prevent the use of cookies, your browser offers the option of preventing the acceptance and storage of new cookies. To find out how this works with your browser, please use the help function of the respective browser. However, we recommend that you leave the cookies function switched on, as only then will you be able to fully benefit from the high level of user comfort that we have set up for you. We do not create user profiles from this user data collected through cookies.
To edit your cookie settings, please click here

4. WEBSITE EVALUATIONS AND TOOLS

We use the following analysis tool to evaluate our websites and describe it to you as follows:
This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. ("Google"). Google Analytics uses "cookies", which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website is usually transmitted to a Google server in the USA and stored there. The IP address transmitted by your browser as part of Google Analytics is not merged with other data from Google. We have also extended Google Analytics on this website with the code "anonymizeIP". This guarantees the masking of your IP address so that all data is collected anonymously. Only in exceptional cases will the full IP address be transferred to a Google server in the USA and shortened there.
On behalf of the operator of this website, Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the website, compiling reports on website activity and providing other services relating to website activity and internet usage to the website operator. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser, however please note that if you do this you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website.
You can also prevent the collection of data generated by the cookie and related to your use of the website (including your IP address) to Google and the processing of this data by Google by downloading and installing the browser plugin available at the following link: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=de
As an alternative to the browser add-on, especially for browsers on mobile devices, you can also prevent the collection by Google Analytics by clicking on this link. An opt-out cookie will be set that prevents the future collection of your data when visiting this website. The opt-out cookie is only valid in this browser and only for our website and is stored on your device. If you delete the cookies in this browser, you must set the opt-out cookie again
We continue to use Google Analytics to analyze data from Double Click cookies and also AdWords for statistical purposes. If you do not wish to do so, you can disable this via the Ads Preferences Manager (https://www.google.com/settings/ads/onweb/?hl=de).
If you wish to object to the collection, you can use a plugin via the following link and install it: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=de

5. SECURITY

Brockhaus AG uses technical and organizational security measures to ensure that your personal data is protected against loss, incorrect modification or unauthorized access by third parties. In any case, only authorized persons have access to the personal data, and only to the extent necessary for the above-mentioned purposes. The security measures are constantly adapted to the improved technical possibilities.

6. FURTHER INFORMATION REQUIREMENTS

6.1 Responsible entity

BROCKHAUS AG, Lünen. For full contact details, see imprint.

6.2 Data protection officer

P2 Consult
Jürgen Golda
Wilhelm-Bläser-Str. 3c, D-59174 Kamen
Phone: +49 (0) 2307 28 74 488
Mail: datenschutz@brockhaus-ag.de

6.3. storage period

We store your data as long as the purpose of storage remains (requests, projects, contracts, etc.) If the purpose ceases to exist or you withdraw consent, your data will be deleted by the regular deletion run, provided that no legal retention periods must be observed.

6.4 Children

We will not knowingly collect or process data from children. To the extent that students make requests, we will only store the data if we have the express consent of the parent or guardian. If children's data may then be stored, we will only share it as required by law. The term "children" includes the definitions from national law and the legal provisions in force at our company.

6.5 Profiling

Profiling of your data does not take place. Automatic decision-making and/or profiling with your data does not take place with us.

6.6 Your rights

You can contact us at any time if you want to make a disclosure, a deletion, a restriction or an objection. To do so, use the contact information provided. Requests must be made in writing so that we can clearly identify the requester.

6.7 Right of complaint

If you have reasonable doubts about our handling of your data, please inform us or contact the relevant supervisory authority.

6.8. Changes

We reserve the right to amend this privacy statement from time to time. Therefore, we recommend that you review this statement regularly.

delete-dialog.general-do-you-want-to-delete: Do you really want to delete {{value}}?

contact.content: Do you have questions, suggestions, or problems with the Burning OKR Tool? You are welcome to contact us.
contact.content-with-link: In case of bugs or suggestions for improvement regarding the tool, please contact us via GitHub. If you would like BROCKHAUS AG to perform customization for you, or if you require consulting or any other service, please contact us via info@brockhaus-ag.de.
contact.title: How to reach us

digitalization.content: With Burning OKR, you digitally map all essential components of the OKR framework and create transparency across teams. The teams manage their own objectives and key results with Burning OKR and make their progress and successes visible. Furthermore, the hierarchies of your company can be made visible within the tool.
digitalization.title: Digitize your entire OKR process

features.content: Our OKR tool enables you to digitalize the OKR process and its result metrics in a holistic way, including all necessary features. In detail, Burning OKR offers...
features.perks-list:
• the authentication via Azure Active Directory or a local user management
  • the management of multiple companies (multitenancy)
  • the mapping of cycles, company structures, teams, objectives and key results
  • a progress indicator for Objectives and Key Results
  • a flexible individualization, including the designation of teams, the restriction of the maximum Key Result number, etc.
  • a data export as Excel spreadsheet
features.title: Innovative features

free-and-open-source.content: The application is completely free for corporate and private customers. In addition, you can view the open source code at any time on GitHub and adapt it to your needs. We are happy to assist you in this process. Make your customizations available as a pull request for the whole world!
free-and-open-source.title: Our free offer for you

further-information.content: For more information on the OKR Framework, please visit the AGILEVERSITY page of BROCKHAUS AG.
further-information.title: Learn more about the OKR Framework and OKR processes

installation.content: Burning OKR is easy to install on various platforms. We offer tutorials on how to install with...
installation.title: Easy installation

target-management.content: Objectives and Key Results are processed in cycles. Design the name, length and content of the cycles according to your wishes. Keep track of the productivity of OKR teams with the Objectives and Key Results progress bar.
target-management.title: Manage and control your company goals

visions.content: The agile OKR framework supports you in achieving strategic business goals through a structured goal-setting process. Short cycles and measurable goals promote regular evaluation of results and give you the opportunity to quickly modify your business model based on new information. With Burning OKR we offer you a powerful and user-friendly OpenSource tool to support you.
visions.title: Realize Visions with the help of OKR

welcome.content: Burning OKR supports you in achieving strategic corporate goals and promotes an agile and transparent corporate culture. The open source OKR tool is based on BROCKHAUS AG's many years of experience with the OKR framework.
welcome.title: Welcome to Burning OKR!
